review:
A very reliable and experienced doctor. I have been consulting her for last ten years for my kids. Extremely satisfied and happy!! Dr. Kapoor listens to your concerns/queries with utmost patience and has a very good & precise diagnose. With both my kids being hyper sensitive (allergic) since birth, Dr. Kapoor has always treated them with utmost precaution, care and expertise. Personally I'm very fond of her calm and composed approach and never lets you panic in the toughest situations. Her support has always been there at any hour and all kids in our family are under her care.
A very warm, friendly, and positive person and always encourages children. She understands child psychology, behavioral patterns among kids very nicely and has always provided valuable guidance in dealing with such issues in kids.

Itâ€™s been 11 years, I am visiting her for my kid. She is a wonderful doctor- very calm and composed. She listens to her patients very calmly. She is never in a hurry. Not only a wonderful doctor, but a wonderful person with a beautiful heart. She treats all her patients as her own family members.
The best doctor. She is very concerned about the child and listens to all queries with utmost patience. She is never in a hurry and I have full faith in her judgement.

Very Professional and caring doctor, since 10years taking consultation for my daughter Navya. Listens every issue with lot of patience. I and my family feels blessed that such a nice doctor sees our daughter takes care of her proper growth and development
Excellent...she listened to us very careful and explained things very properly and patiently..........
